mapper.select: select user_id, user_name, user_birth, user_gender, user_addr1, user_addr2, user_role_id, user_passwd, date_format(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) as create_time from user_info where user_id = #{userId}
select count(*) from user_info where user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: insert into user_info(user_id, user_name, user_birth, user_gender, user_addr1, user_addr2, user_role_id, user_passwd) values (#{userId}, #{userName}, #{userBirth}, #{userGender}, #{userAddr1}, #{userAddr2}, #{userRoleId}, #{userPasswd})
